contents.contents: Now cross the square and on your left, you will see the Maison du Terroir et de l’artisanat. Turn right into the “Rue de l’Ormerie”.
In the 10th century there were 80,000 inhabitants. Today there are only 12,000.

question.contents: What caused the decline of Provins?

explanations.contents: It happened over a few decades in the 14th century because the fairs disappeared, (fairs in the South took over), trading routes were changed, wars and epidemics ravaged the area.
